name: Compounded Pain
text: Your painful stare causes two additional effects.
prerequisites: Mesmerist level 13th, painful stare class feature.
benefit: You can apply the effects of two stare feats to your painful stares.
normal: You can apply the effects of only one stare feat to a given painful stare.
text_zh: 你的痛苦注视能够导致两种额外效果。
prerequisites_zh: 催眠师13级，痛苦注视（Painful Stare）职业能力。
benefit_zh: 你可以将两项注视专长（stare feat）的效果应用至你的痛苦注视（Painful Stare）职业能力上。
normal_zh: 你仅能将一项注视专长的效果应用至一次痛苦注视职业能力上。
